alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit; Haleakala Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 11 at 4:20PM HST until January 12 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR MAUI AND BIG ISLAND SUMMITS UNTIL 6 PM HST FRIDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY FOR ALL OTHER AREAS EXCEPT WINDWARD BIG ISLAND... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sustained west to northwest winds 40 to 60 mph over Haleakala Summit, and 80 to 100 mph over Mauna Kea and Mauna Loa Summits. Gusts near 70 mph over Haleakala and near 125 mph over Big Island Summits. * WHERE...Haleakala Summit on Maui and Mauna Kea and Mauna Loa Summits on the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking dangerous. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Be prepared for road-closures. Postpone travel to the summits until conditions improve.
